title: Enhancing the antioxidant properties of functional herbal beverages using Ultrasonic-Assisted extraction: Optimized formulation and synergistic combinations of taurine and vit. C
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Kadry Z. Ghanem, Manal M. Ramadan, Amira Taha Mohammed, Abeer E. Mahmoud, Kirill Babintsev, Wael M. Elmessery, Tamer M. El-Messery
